hero.title: Master Your Money,
hero.subtitle: The only financial companion you'll ever need. Track expenses, manage investments, automate EMIs, and achieve your goals with AI-powered insights.

features.title: Everything You Need in One App
features.subtitle: From daily expense tracking to advanced investment management, FinMate provides all the tools you need to take complete control of your financial life.

smartTransactionTracking.title: Smart Transaction Tracking
smartTransactionTracking.description: AI-powered expense categorization with real-time insights across all your accounts.

intelligentBudgetManagement.title: Intelligent Budget Management
intelligentBudgetManagement.description: Set smart budgets, get predictive alerts, and achieve financial goals faster.

investmentPortfolioManager.title: Investment Portfolio Manager
investmentPortfolioManager.description: Track stocks, crypto, mutual funds, and SIPs with real-time performance analytics.

autoEmiLoanManager.title: Auto EMI & Loan Manager
autoEmiLoanManager.description: Automated EMI processing, loan tracking, and payment reminders with pg_cron.

personalLendingTracker.title: Personal Lending Tracker
personalLendingTracker.description: Track money lent to friends/family with payment reminders and interest calculations.

financialCalculatorsSuite.title: Financial Calculators Suite
financialCalculatorsSuite.description: EMI, Tax, Zakat, and investment projection calculators for informed decisions.

features.technologySubtitle: Built with cutting-edge features to give you professional-grade financial management capabilities.

aiFinancialInsights.title: AI Financial Insights
aiFinancialInsights.description: Get personalized recommendations and spending pattern analysis

autoTransactionSystem.title: Auto-Transaction System
autoTransactionSystem.description: Automated EMI processing with PostgreSQL pg_cron integration

multiFormatReports.title: Multi-Format Reports
multiFormatReports.description: Export data in CSV, PDF, and Excel formats

multiCurrencySupport.title: Multi-Currency Support
multiCurrencySupport.description: Track finances in USD, EUR, GBP, INR, BDT, JPY, CAD, AUD

progressiveWebApp.title: Progressive Web App
progressiveWebApp.description: Native app experience with offline functionality

realtimeSync.title: Real-time Sync
realtimeSync.description: Instant data synchronization across all your devices

useCases.title: Perfect for Every Financial Journey
useCases.subtitle: Whether you're just starting out or managing complex investments, FinMate adapts to your needs.

personalFinanceManagement.title: Personal Finance Management
personalFinanceManagement.description: Track daily expenses, manage budgets, and build wealth systematically.

investmentPortfolioTracking.title: Investment Portfolio Tracking
investmentPortfolioTracking.description: Monitor stocks, mutual funds, crypto, and SIPs with detailed analytics.

familyFinancialPlanning.title: Family Financial Planning
familyFinancialPlanning.description: Manage household budgets, track lending, and plan for family goals.

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security You Can Trust
security.subtitle: Your financial data is protected with the same security standards used by major banks and financial institutions worldwide.

aes256Encryption.title: AES-256 Encryption
aes256Encryption.description: Military-grade encryption for all data transmission and storage

rowLevelSecurity.title: Row-Level Security
rowLevelSecurity.description: Advanced PostgreSQL RLS ensures complete data isolation

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: No data selling, no tracking, your information stays yours

complianceReady.title: Compliance Ready
complianceReady.description: Built with international financial regulations in mind

testimonials.title: Loved by Thousands of Users
testimonials.subtitle: See what our users have to say about FinMate

rashed.name: Rashed Ahmed
rashed.content: FinMate has completely transformed how I manage my finances in Bangladesh. The multi-currency support and EMI tracking are incredible!

fatima.name: Fatima Khan
fatima.content: The investment tracking and Zakat calculator features are exactly what I needed. Best financial app I've used!

hassan.name: Mohammad Hassan
hassan.content: Simple, beautiful, and powerful. The automated EMI system saves me so much time and stress.

cta.title: Your Financial Freedom
cta.subtitle: Stop letting money stress control your life. Take charge with FinMate's comprehensive financial management platform.
